subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi New to the Group and to Franks Box
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Hi Cyn,

Good to see you here!

If you look through some of the older e-mails you'll find info on the box 
and how Frank uses it.

If you really want to see what the debate has been about, it's there in 
the e-mails, too.

Zack

On Tue, 4 Dec 2007, Cyn wrote:

>
> My name is Cyn. I'm very interested in the box and how it works.  I'm
> going to attempt to make one myself, though I have to admit...I'm not
> real sure I'm going to be able to remember all I learned in industrial
> arts class 22 years ago. LOL.
>
> I've been lurking a few days and I've noticed there's a debate going on.
> Is debate the right word? Anyway I'm wanting to find out, for myself, if
> the box works.
>
> Any tips?
>
>
